summary: This is a search and seizure warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York, authorizing the search of Jeffrey Epstein's residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY. The warrant seeks evidence related to violations of Title 18, U.S. Code, Sections 371 (conspiracy) and 1591 (sex trafficking of minors). It was issued by Magistrate Judge Barbara Moses.

persons.name: Barbara Moses
persons.context: Issued the search and seizure warrant for the premises at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY.

events.title: Search Warrant Issued for Epstein's NY Residence
events.description: A federal search warrant was issued authorizing the search of Jeffrey Epstein's residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY, for evidence related to sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: The search warrant targets Jeffrey Epstein's nearly 19,000 square foot multi-story residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY.
The warrant authorizes seizure of evidence related to violations of Title 18, U.S. Code, Sections 1591 (sex trafficking of minors) and 371 (conspiracy).
Items to be seized include evidence of occupancy/ownership, layout, furnishings, and any evidence of the subject offenses.
The warrant was issued by U.S. Magistrate Judge Barbara Moses.
The document indicates the investigation was focused on sex trafficking of minors and related conspiracy charges.
